name: DinoKarts - It's Machine Learning
description:
A new project serving somewhat as an extension of Pop 'n Kart, developed last year. This features a simplified version of Pop 'n Kart's physics. The main draw of the project is that it makes use of the Unity MLAgents package. The result is 6 AI racers that drive around a short track for your amusement.

Left Click / Right Click / Left Arrow / Right Arrow - change racer

(The game is purely spectacle - the player does not control a car)
